name: MinerHD
description:
Explore the mine. Find a coal, silver, gold, platinum and diamonds. But look out for a dangerous water sources. Keep Your health on a high level. Buy a few dynamite sticks from time to time and make a booom. If You die under ground, then nobody know You, so, If You want to be on a leaderboard You have to back to bank and make some cash.

Google Play Services is available, so let's try to brake my Hi-Scores
I've hope You will be better then me ;)

If You share my app, then You will receive (in all my games!) Special Bonuses and No Ads for 7 days (for each captured player, with no limit)
